name: One Chance (itch) (Unholy Cathar)
description:
"A lone samurai, outcast and shamed, you return seeking revenge. Cut through those who wronged you and dethrone the Emperor of the Crimson Lotus."

-----

Controls: Spacebar

----

Submission for the Mini Jam 95: Chance

The restriction: No RNG

And no RNG was used! All timers are hard set lol

And that was the plan for the rest but sadly could only get together 1 level (of a planned 3). Attack when the enemy is winding up to win!

Thanks for the jam, and good luck to everyone else! Can't wait to play!
